body_html:
As you originally reported:
tensorflow/core/kernels/mkl_lrn_op.cc:595] Check failed: dnnConversionCreate_F32( &convert_input, static_cast<dnnLayout_t>(inimage_shape.GetCurLayout()), lt_internal_input) == E_SUCCESS (-1 vs. 0)

The bug lies in LRN op as commenting out the two LRN layers in your script avoids the error. We will fix the LRN MKL ops. Please stay tuned. Thank you!

body:
As you originally reported: 
tensorflow/core/kernels/mkl_lrn_op.cc:595] Check failed: dnnConversionCreate_F32( &convert_input, static_cast<dnnLayout_t>(inimage_shape.GetCurLayout()), lt_internal_input) == E_SUCCESS (-1 vs. 0) 

The bug lies in LRN op as commenting out the two LRN layers in your script avoids the error. We will fix the LRN MKL ops. Please stay tuned. Thank you!
